feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 07:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
